answers.answer: I have anxiety.  That's how I feel when i'm starting to have an attack.  But it also gets hard to breath.  Maybe you should check your sugar also...I'm not saying you are but you might be getting gestational diabetes.  I also had it with both of my pregnancies.
Thank youI called dr told me it could be low blood pressure or I just waited to long to eat lol so I mean thank you tho for you comment/ helpful

question: I don't know if it's an anxiety attackI was just making some breakfast and out of a sudden my heart beat starts beating fast in like 5 minutes I felt shaky and light-headed  this is the 2nd time that it has happen to me I called my dr but the staff in lunch or something I dranked a little bit of pop and it calmed me down.It's happened to me before too like before I got pregnantI would just pop a candy or drink something sugary but I'm just worried now that I am pregnant I'm 26+2
title: Anxiety attack or what??
